item.title: The Customer Success Team Can Incentivize Business Growth—Here’s How
item.description: Focusing on customer experience doesn’t require extra time, but it does lead to happier, more loyal customers and increased retention.

item.title: Former Tennis Pro Shares on the Power of Pivoting Amid Adversity
item.description: Next time things go wrong, step back and find a way to change your ‘What now?’ into ‘What’s next?’

item.title: How Leaders Can Maximize Productivity in the Age of AI
item.description: Leaders must take proactive action to tap into the full potential of the quiet workers.

item.title: A Founders’ Guide to Leading With Empathy and Resilience During Uncertainty
item.description: In an environment of uncertainty and change, the one thing leaders can control is their emotional response.

item.title: How to Respond Authentically and Not React in the Workplace
item.description: You can slow down, breathe, and choose to respond rather than overreact.
